mapper.select: SELECT distinct T2.MENU_URL FROM BASE_ROLE_ATUTH T1 LEFT JOIN BASE_MENU T2 ON T1.MENU_CD = T2.MENU_CD WHERE T2.IS_USE='1' AND T1.ROLE_ID=#{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT t2.MENU_URL,t1.ROLE_ID FROM BASE_ROLE_ATUTH t1 INNER JOIN BASE_MENU t2 ON t1.menu_cd=t2.menu_cd AND t2.IS_USE='1' INNER JOIN BASE_ROLE t3 ON t1.role_id=t3.role_id AND t3.IS_USE='1'

SELECT r.ROLE_ID,r.ROLE_NM,r.ROLE_TYPE,r.REMARK,r.IS_USE, r.CREATOR,r.CREATE_AT,r.MODER,r.MOD_COUNT,r.MOD_AT,r.IS_DEL FROM BASE_ROLE r INNER JOIN base_user_role ur ON r.ROLE_ID=ur.ROLE_ID where r.IS_USE='1' and ur.USER_ID=#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT r.ROLE_ID,r.ROLE_NM,r.ROLE_TYPE,r.REMARK,r.IS_USE, r.CREATOR,r.CREATE_AT,r.MODER,r.MOD_COUNT,r.MOD_AT,r.IS_DEL FROM BASE_ROLE r where r.IS_USE='1' and r.ROLE_ID=#{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
